directions: In a large saucepan, simmer chicken breasts in water  for about 7 to 10 minutes, or until cooked through. Drain, cool, and tear into small pieces with a fork.
In a large bowl, combine mayonnaise, chutney, curry powder, and pepper. Stir in chicken, pecans, grapes, and onions. Chill.
title: Wonderful Chicken Curry Salad
